snippet.title: Soulash v0.2 Alpha Trailer
snippet.description:
Soulash is a fantasy roguelike where you take the role of a forgotten god set on destroying the world.

It features big open world, crafting, tactical turn-based combat, permadeath, unique items system, survival mechanics and many more.

Alpha version will release on Windows platform.

Game: https://wizardsofthecode.itch.io/soulash
Devlog: https://wizardsofthecode.itch.io/soulash/devlog
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ArturSmiarowski
